description: Drawer container with 560px width, header with title and Add button
Load and display materials list via listProjectMaterials with loading/empty states
Materials table showing product name, SKU, quantity, rate, total, status badge
Multi-currency support: format amounts, group unbilled totals by currency
Add form with searchable product dropdown (searchServiceCatalogForPicker)
Price/currency selector with auto-select first, single price read-only display
Quantity input (min 1), optional description, calculated total display
Add material via addProjectMaterial with validation and success/error toasts
Delete unbilled materials via deleteProjectMaterial with success/error toasts
No-client warning message when project has no client assigned
Data automation IDs for E2E testing (ReflectionContainer, withDataAutomationId)
